articles.author: Stephanie Nebehay, Michael Shields, Parisa Hafezi
articles.title: WHO warns against 'fatal' complacency in global fight against coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: WHO warns against 'fatal' complacency in global fight against coronavirus The Globe and Mail COVID-19 outbreak: Here's what's happening around the world Thursday CBC.ca Coronavirus has 'pandemic potential', says World Health Organisation Channel 4 News Has co…
articles.content:
A worker wearing protective gear sprays disinfectant as a precaution against the coronavirus in Seoul, South Korea, on Feb. 27, 2020.
Ahn Young-joon/The Associated Press
No country should make the fatal mistake of assuming it will be spared the coronavirus,… [+6031 chars]
